text:
钢丝绳的报废标准。（ 7分）
1) 出现整根绳股断裂;
2) 一个捻距内断丝数超过钢丝总数的10%。
3) 钢丝绳表面钢丝磨损达到钢丝直径的40%或钢丝绳公称直径的7%时，钢丝绳应报废。
4) 钢丝绳内外部出现腐蚀，变形等异常情况，钢丝绳应报废。
2. 天车工安全操作规程（8分）
1) 开车前，必须对天车钢丝绳、限位、传动、制动机构进行检查。
2) 开车前，必须鸣铃示警3次，确认车上无他人后再启动天车。
3) 上下天车，必须拉开刀闸，天车作业不准抢上抢下。
trans:
Scrap Standards for Steel Wire Ropes (7 points)
1) The entire strand of the rope is broken;
2) The number of broken wires within one lay length exceeds 10% of the total.
3) If surface wire wear reaches 40% of the wire diameter or 7% of the nominal diameter of the wire rope, the wire rope must be scrapped.
4) The wire rope must be scrapped if internal or external corrosion, deformation, or other abnormalities are observed.
2. Safety Operating Procedures for Overhead Crane Operator (8 points)
1) Before starting the crane, inspect the crane’s wire rope, limiters, transmission mechanisms, and braking systems.
2) Before starting the crane, sound the alarm bell three times and ensure no one is on the crane before proceeding.
3) When getting on or off the crane, turn off the power switch, and do not rush or take shortcuts during crane operations.
